summary.span: Converts the string name of an event setter handler to a delegate representation.

span.span: Converts the string name of an event setter handler to a delegate representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Per ulteriori informazioni su come il codice XAML per WPF elabora i nomi dei gestori di eventi, vedere [Panoramica di XAML (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).For more information about how XAML for WPF processes event handler names, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
